description: Microsoft Excel is a must have skill for any professional because of its widespread use in the home, educational institutions as well as corporates. This is the first course in our series on Microsoft Excel courses. It starts by covering the differences between the previous Excel version and the 2013 version. It covers simple topics such as data inputs, formatting and printing. It is aimed at preparing you for more advanced topics such as Data Analysis, Financial Modelling & VBA Development in the subsequent (advanced) Excel courses.
title: Microsoft Excel 2013 (Basic)
